body_html:
@jubjamie Some screenshots would be very helpful as I don't have a device on hand to verify this with. It's possible this is a bug in how those devices report the camera or display orientation and the code mixes up width and height, or something of that nature.

When you turn on debug visualizations (using the volume keys), what do you see in the thumbnail view? It should be rendering static detections there.

body:
@jubjamie Some screenshots would be very helpful as I don't have a device on hand to verify this with. It's possible this is a bug in how those devices report the camera or display orientation and the code mixes up width and height, or something of that nature.

When you turn on debug visualizations (using the volume keys), what do you see in the thumbnail view? It should be rendering static detections there.
